title: Announcement
medium: Offset lithograph and letterpress on coated white paper board; mounted on grey-blue album sheet to show recto.
description: Recto: image is like a playing card with pair of hearts and fashion models

Announcement.
Offset lithograph and letterpress on coated white paper board; mounted on grey-blue album sheet to show recto.. Gift of James Howard Fraser. 2000-68-211.
